creditline: Gift of funds from the Friends of the Institute
description: in the form of a circle intersected with a raised square; straight walls; three feet on bottom; tan with dark brown leaf and geometric designs; light brown dots; green glaze drips; five brown dots at interior on square, connected by lines; from a set of five
medium: Mino ware, Yashichida-Oribe type; stoneware with copper-green glaze, red slip, and underglaze iron oxide
title: Set of serving dishes (mukōzuke) with design of willow gourds, melons, and geometric patterns
